```{r 32-remove-all, include = FALSE}
rm(list = ls())
```


## Import many files

<details><summary>*Click here to show setup code.*</summary>
```{r include = FALSE}
### Import many files

```
```{r 31-setup-31-import-many-r}
library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)

library(here)

library(conflicted)
conflict_prefer("filter", "dplyr")

files <- dir(path = here("data"), pattern = "[.]xlsx$", full.names = TRUE)
files
```
</details>


```{r include = FALSE}
# Manually
```
```{r 31-manually}
files %>%
  map_dfr(~ readxl::read_excel(.))
```


```{r include = FALSE}
# Using rio
```
```{r 31-using-rio}
rio::import_list(files)

files %>%
  rio::import_list(rbind = TRUE) %>%
  as_tibble()
```
